author: James Dator
title: Saluting 7 incredibly chill teachers who let their students watch March Madness in class
text:
Working during March Madness sucks, and that pain is double for teachers. It’s impossible to hide a tablet in the cubicle, or watch box scores in a second browser window with 30 inquisitive kids staring at you — especially when those kids just want to be watching basketball as well. Let’s appreciate these awesome educators for realizing that it’s OK to take a break from class sometimes.
